data.text: @ASTHO @nirav_mainecdc @CDCgov @AmerAcadPeds @aafp @AmerMedicalAssn You just want children to die, or suffer from a life long immune deficiency which is being called VAIDS. You're not fooling people anymore you fucking pieces of shit!! https://t.co/EYQi5KULEr

@ASTHO @nirav_mainecdc @CDCgov @AmerAcadPeds @aafp @AmerMedicalAssn Covid does not pose a significant effect for the majority of children. Being shot up with an injection with no long term studies, has known cardiac effects, waning efficacy, does not stop transmission or infection DOES pose a huge threat to the current & future health of our kids

“ASTHO’s position on vaccination is clear. Data show that vaccines are one of the most effective ways to keep people, including children, safe from COVID-19 by preventing serious illness, hospitalization, and death," said ASTHO President Dr. @nirav_mainecdc.
